snippet: In “Revisionist Art,” Bob Dylan shows 30 silk-screen-on-canvas works in which he has taken the covers of old magazines and tinkered with images, cover lines and more.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews Revisionist Art: Thirty Works by Bob Dylan exhibit at Gagosian Gallery.
lead_paragraph: In “Revisionist Art,” Bob Dylan shows 30 silk-screen-on-canvas works in which he has taken the covers of old magazines and tinkered with images, cover lines and more.

headline.main: ‘Revisionist Art: Thirty Works by Bob Dylan’
headline.print_headline: Bob Dylan: ‘Revisionist Art: Thirty Works by Bob Dylan’
